com.datamelt.util

Class AvroSchemaUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.util.AvroSchemaUtility

  • public class AvroSchemaUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    utility class to simplify the retrieval of fields and data of an Avro file.
    Author:
    uwe geercken

      • getFieldType

        public org.apache.avro.Schema.Type getFieldType(org.apache.avro.Schema.Field schemaField)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        retrieves the type of the field from an Avro schema the type of a field is defined in the Avro schema. The type can have one or two values: either it has simply a single type of string, int, float, etc. (see Avro documentation for possible types) or it can have the type of "null". If more than these two types are defined, this method will throw an exception, as the type can not be determined. Otherwise the method will return the type (string, int, etc.).
        Parameters:
        schemaField - the Avro schema field
        Returns:
        the Avro type of the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception thrown when a field has more than two possible types

      • getFieldNames

        public java.lang.String[] getFieldNames()
        extracts the names of all fields of a complex type=RECORD from an Avro schema
        Returns:
        an array of field names

      • getGenericRecordData

        public java.lang.Object[] getGenericRecordData(org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord record)
        Collects all values of the avro record for the array of field names
        Parameters:
        record - an avro record
        Returns:
        array of objects
